feed.title: Drop Trio Live Archive
feed.tagline: Weekly live tracks from Houston's original instrumental funk jazz band.

info.div: This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader or syndicated to another site.

content.div:
Title: The Big S.O.
Recorded: 12/1/2005
Location: The Engine Room
Added to archive: 12/30/2005
Length: 3:40
Notes: Board recording, opening for The Jacob Fred Jazz Odyssey. Recorded by Jason Priesman. Read more.
Download: Podcast

Title: Abbey Rhodes
Recorded: 11/4/2005
Location: Brasil
Added to archive: 11/25/2005
Length: 9:14
Notes: From our CD listening party at Brasil, with robot voice solo. Read more.
Download: Podcast

Title: The Antepenultimate Countdown
Recorded: 11/4/2005
Location: Brasil
Added to archive: 11/11/2005
Length: 3:54
Notes: Improv from our CD listening party show at Brasil. Read more.

Title: Flux
Recorded: 11/3/2005

Title: Shelby
Recorded: 5/21/2005
Location: Cezanne's
Added to archive: 10/14/2005
Length: 6:08
Notes: From our soon to be released live album, Cezanne. Read more.
Download: Podcast

Title: Jeff Rocks (Improv)
Recorded: 7/24/2005
Location: Mary Jane's
Added to archive: 9/16/2005
Length: 11:40
Notes: Stage recording from the Houston Press Music Awards afterparty at Mary Jane's (RIP). An improv dedicated to our pal Jeff Balke of Orange Is In who was hanging out that night. Read more.
Download: Podcast

Title: Melody-Melody
Recorded: 8/1/2004
Location: Last Concert Cafe
Added to archive: 7/29/2005

Added to archive: 7/22/2005

Notes: Stage recording from last weekend's show at Helios. An improv in honor of our friends in Two Star Symphony. Read more.

Notes: Stage recording, from our first show at Helios. Read more.

Title: This Is My Funny Voice (Improv)
Recorded: 5/30/2005
Location: Magik Studio
Added to archive: 7/1/2005
Length: 10:56
Notes: Recorded in our rehearsal space at Magik Studios in Houston, TX. An improvisation to commemorate the end our tenure there. Thanks for everything guys!
Download: MP3

Notes: Direct zort recording. Recorded during our trip to the MIT Time Traveler convention tomorrow.

Title: Full Set - Brasil, 4/22/2005
Recorded: 4/22/2005
Location: Brasil
Added to archive: 4/29/2005
Length: full set
Notes: Stage recording. Patrick's 1 year anniversary show, with lots of crazy prog improv. Read more.
Download:

Title: Shelby
Recorded: 4/30/2004
Location: Brasil
Added to archive: 4/22/2005
Length: 5:19
Notes: Stage recording. The original improvisation of the tune "Shelby", during Patrick's first gig in Drop Trio, on the one-year anniversary of his joining the band. Read more.
Download: MP3

Recorded: 7/11/2003
Location: Kaveh Kanes
Added to archive: 4/1/2005
Length: 4:46
Notes: Stage recording, with Marc Reczek on bass. In honor of Marc's wedding to Lindsey next week. Congratulations Marc! Sorry Lindsey!
Download: MP3

Location: Super Happy Fun Land
Added to archive: 3/16/2005

Notes: Multitrack recording by Guy Schwartz and Roger Taus. Totally improvised set - our first year at the annual South By Due East festival in Houston. Read more.

Title: Not To Touch The Earth
Recorded: 5/8/2004
Location: The Art Studio
Added to archive: 12/31/2004
Length: 6:25
Notes: Live stage recording. Our first cover song to grace the live archive - this is a tune by the Doors (though scarcely recognizable) Read more.

Recorded: 5/8/2004

Title: Melody-Melody
Recorded: 9/3/2004
Location: Vortex (Beaumont, TX)
Added to archive: 11/12/2004
Length: 17:38
Notes: Stage recording. This was the first time we played the 17 minute epic version. Also, Ian's "Middle G" key on the Rhodes had broken only a few songs before this. Read more.
